content: I want to participate in GSoC 2019 in your organization so I want to know what will be the format of the proposal and also what will be the file extension type of the proposal.

@Sagen Soren there's intentionally no format, so you can make it look however you want. we do want to see specific things addressed in the proposal like a week-to-week plan for the 10 coding weeks, major objectives, any schedule/vacation/academic conflicts, etc, but it's pretty open format-wise. If you post a draft, we'll try to give you feedback beforehand too.
you can also find all previous accepted proposals on our website wiki for examples
